snippet.title: K.C.'s Krazy Chase! - Odyssey 2 Pac-Man Game (N.A.P. 1982)
snippet.description:
K.C.'s Krazy Chase! - Odyssey 2 - Designer Ed Averett followed up his unofficial Pac-Man game K.C. Munchkin! with this sequel that is better in every way.  Beware the Atar...er, I mean the Dratapillar!

Gobble up the history of the Odyssey 2 at The Dot Eaters:
http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=console/odyssey%c2%b2

http://www.thedoteaters.com  Video Game History 101

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
